short_desc: Provides single women and women with children a place of shelter and support in time of need because of issues such as a recent divorce, low income, job loss or a debilitating illness or escaping domestic violence
description: Women, and families are encouraged to find long-term relief from homelessness at the Mission through an extensive, residential recovery program. Program offers: drug and alcohol addiction recovery; job skills training and vocational classes; education and GED certification with local community colleges; counseling and spiritual guidance; computer training; biblical training; life management skills; family management skills and job placement.
